short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Against Phishing browser extension prevents you against phishing based on blacklisted and whitelisted crypto related resources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Against Phishing is blocking websites and twitter accounts which are blacklisted in our database or very similar to whitelisted.

By using Extension Against Phishing you are one step ahead thiefts. It automatically detect phishing websites which are similar to existing crypto projects. You don't need to way for reporting officially the website as malicious to be saved.

The blocking works by redirecting the user to our page where we collect the data about blocked website addresses and the reasons why the page was blocked. The date collecting empowers us in building better tools against phishing.

The extension code is open source. So, you don't need to trust us you can read the code here: https://github.com/AgainstPhishing/extension-against-phishing .
